class_notes:
Survey of Neuroscience and Behavioral Biology:
The course is intended for first- and second-year students who are interested in NBB but have not yet taken any NBB courses. After two to three weeks introducing neuroscience in general, we will focus on specific topics with guest lecturers from around Emory College and the School of Medicine. NBB 270 counts as an NBB elective.
course_description: Study of variable topics of special interest in neuroscience and behavioral biology. May be repeated for credit when topics vary.
